Description:

Resolved - We’re back! Everything should be up and running. Thanks for bearing with us.

Feb 27\
Title:
15:04 UTC
Investigating - We're having some trouble connecting users on Spectrum (internet service provider) to Dropbox. This may extend to users on other internet service providers. We're looking into this and we'll share another update as soon as we can.
column4: Users on some internet service providers are unable to connect to Dropbox servers

Description:
21:46 UTC
Resolved - We’re back! Everything should be up and running. Thanks for bearing with us.

Jan 2\
Title:
21:36 UTC
Monitoring - We've partially recovered and hope to be fully back up soon.

Jan 2\
column4:
21:15 UTC
Identified - Most parts of the Dropbox platform are experiencing an outage. We’re working to fix the problem as quickly as we can. We’ll share another update shortly.
